title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 318.5 - Calculation of rate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 318.5 - Calculation of rate

State Regulations

The assessment rate shall be a percentage of standard
premiums and calculated as follows: Total estimated annual expenses as defined
in section
318.3
of this Part divided by
total estimated statewide premiums as defined in 318.4(b) of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
318.5

Adopted, New

York State Register January 7, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 01, eff. 1/7/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
